Articles.Content:
Heyo kerbonauts!

I was wondering if there's currently a 1.3.1 compatible mod that allows my kerbonaut engineers to disassemble/remove certain parts of a ship.
Why? Well i have a base on the moon and to get parts there i use RCS, but they look ugly on the base, so want to remove those as they also serve no purpose.

Cheers!
KIS/KAS is where it's at.  Turns it into a completely different game, and there are a ton of other mods out there that complement it.

While I highly recommend KIS, I do feel I should mention that for *removing* parts from a ship, both MKS and Pathfinder have (different) systems that will allow Kerbals on EVA to disassemble individual parts (or possibly entire vessels) and turn a portion of their mass into useful resources.  For simple removal, I find those to be better options than KIS, as the parts no longer exist.
